comments.body: I think we should have tests for this. I would inject a mock'd socket and work from there

I think I've finally done this, but it was more complicated than I expected so I don't know if I did it all right...

I needed to use Context in order to get a different one in the tests (a mock) but since we need (well, want) an instance-per-connection I had to make the context value a typedef/factory function. I couldn't find any existing code doing similar things to know if this is best (except VM WebSockets which are similar).

PTAL and let me know if anything seems weird and I'll fix/change. Thanks!
